title: Is Spellthief officially stronger than Doran's Ring?
body:
{{item:3303}} 
The only downfall to this is 
-5 Ap 
-0.25% Regen
-4 Mana
-60 Hp

{{item:1056}} 
-2 Gold Per 10seconds
-13 Additional Damage
-Gold On hit

{{item:3098}} 
As soon as you upgrade it to Frostfang the item become superior.

On top with the amount of Mana regen from skill tree I feel like Spellthief is more efficient and has more kill pressure.

replies.body:
-60 HP is a big deal at lv1, it means you will lose every single lv1 or lv2 fight, and a good player will take advantage of that.

You dont get any on hit damage/gold unless you suck at last hitting so badly you simply cant do it.

Dorans has way better mp regen.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QyjkETXx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-28T22:59:24.295+0000)
>
> -60 HP is a big deal at lv1, it means you will lose every single lv1 or lv2 fight, and a good player will take advantage of that.
> 
> You dont get any on hit damage/gold unless you suck at last hitting so badly you simply cant do it.
> 
> Dorans has way better mp regen.

Have you seen Frostfang? 60 hp is not a big deal when you have Range + Biscuit spawning.

> [{quoted}](name=taleofsonata,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QyjkETXx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-12-28T23:00:30.825+0000)
>
> Have you seen Frostfang? 60 hp is not a big deal when you have Range + Biscuit spawning.

It is when Talon does a little math and knows he can all-in you at lv2 for a free 100-0 kill.
Talon's level 2 is almost as strong as old Sion's.

You can consider Spellthief's an AP Cull. It has weaker combat stats, but eventually pays for itself, with a small bonus. Unlike Cull however, you can't really speed up its rate of gold generation, so you can't buy it late like you can with Cull.

> [{quoted}](name=I am Rubick Sama,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QyjkETXx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-28T23:01:15.485+0000)
>
> gold is disabled while farming

Gold is not disabled for too long while farming letting you poke times to times.

it is tho

for each minion you kill the cd is increased by 12 seconds
so unless you give up farm i can't see how you can generate gold from the item while farming
